file_edits.reasoning: Added Google-style docstring for FieldDefinition dataclass explaining its purpose and attributes

edits.content:
@dataclass
class FieldDefinition:
    """Define metadata and processing rules for an enrichment field.

    Specifies how a field should be processed, validated, and merged
    during company enrichment operations.

    Attributes:
        field_path: Dot-notation path to the field (e.g., "firm_information.firm_name")
        field_type: The data type of the field
        pydantic_model: Reference to Pydantic model if field uses structured data
    """
    field_path: str  # e.g., "firm_information.firm_name"
    field_type: FieldType
    pydantic_model: Optional[Type[BaseModel]] = None  # Reference to Pydantic model if applicable
edits.description: Added Google-style docstring for FieldDefinition dataclass explaining its purpose and attributes
